groups.name: Content Writing
groups.description: Prompts for creating various types of written content

groups.name: Image Generation
groups.description: Prompts for generating images with AI

groups.name: Code & Development
groups.description: Prompts for coding assistance and development tasks

groups.name: Marketing & SEO
groups.description: Prompts for marketing content and SEO optimisation

prompts.title: Blog Post Introduction
prompts.content: Write an engaging introduction for a blog post about [TOPIC]. The introduction should hook the reader, explain why the topic matters, and preview what they'll learn. Keep it conversational and under 150 words.

prompts.title: Product Description
prompts.content: Create a compelling product description for [PRODUCT NAME]. Highlight the key features, benefits, and what makes it unique. Use persuasive language that appeals to [TARGET AUDIENCE]. Include a call-to-action at the end.

prompts.title: Social Media Caption
prompts.content: Write an engaging social media caption for [PLATFORM] about [TOPIC/PRODUCT]. Include relevant hashtags, emojis, and a call-to-action. Keep it concise and attention-grabbing. Maximum 280 characters for Twitter, 2200 for Instagram.

prompts.title: Professional Headshot
prompts.content: Professional corporate headshot of a [AGE] [GENDER] [PROFESSION], neutral grey background, studio lighting, business attire, confident expression, high resolution, photorealistic

prompts.title: Product Photography
prompts.content: Professional product photography of [PRODUCT], clean white background, soft studio lighting, high detail, commercial quality, 4k resolution, centered composition

prompts.title: Abstract Background
prompts.content: Abstract [COLOUR] gradient background, smooth flowing shapes, modern minimalist design, soft lighting, high resolution, suitable for website hero section

prompts.title: WordPress Plugin Function
prompts.content: Create a WordPress plugin function that [DESCRIBE FUNCTIONALITY]. Follow WordPress coding standards, include proper sanitisation and validation, add inline documentation, and ensure it's secure and performant.

prompts.title: Debug Code Issue
prompts.content: I'm getting this error: [ERROR MESSAGE]. Here's my code: [CODE]. Please identify the issue, explain what's causing it, and provide a corrected version with comments explaining the fix.

prompts.title: Code Review & Optimisation
prompts.content: Review this code and suggest improvements for performance, security, and best practices: [CODE]. Provide specific recommendations with examples of how to implement them.

prompts.title: SEO Meta Description
prompts.content: Write an SEO-optimised meta description for a webpage about [TOPIC]. Include the primary keyword '[KEYWORD]' naturally. Keep it between 150-160 characters, make it compelling to encourage clicks, and accurately describe the page content.

prompts.title: Email Marketing Subject Lines
prompts.content: Generate 10 compelling email subject lines for [CAMPAIGN TYPE/PRODUCT]. Target audience: [AUDIENCE]. Goal: [GOAL - e.g., increase opens, drive sales]. Make them attention-grabbing but not spammy. Include a mix of curiosity, urgency, and value-driven approaches.

prompts.title: Landing Page Copy
prompts.content: Write persuasive landing page copy for [PRODUCT/SERVICE]. Include: 1) Attention-grabbing headline, 2) Subheadline explaining the benefit, 3) 3-5 key features with benefits, 4) Social proof section, 5) Strong call-to-action. Target audience: [AUDIENCE]. Tone: [TONE].
